ai.summary: The +B39 West Diversion is a very short, easy walk in the United Kingdom, totaling about 0.3 km. It's designed for a quick outdoor excursion with flat terrain and minimal effort.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat, well-maintained path typical of urban or rural diversion routes. Expect an easy walk with level ground and occasional sections that may be grassy or paved depending on the exact stretch.
ai.safety_notes: As with any outdoor walk, check the weather and wear suitable footwear. Stay on marked paths, be aware of cyclists or pedestrians on shared routes, and carry a light layer in case of rain or cold. Short distance, but supervise children and avoid accessing private property.
recommended_gear: Sunny hat and sunscreen (in sunny weather)
ai.best_seasons: All year, with especially pleasant conditions in spring and autumn in the UK. Winter can be wet and daylight hours shorter.

seo.title: +B39 West Diversion - Easy 0.3 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the +B39 West Diversion, a short 0.3 km easy hike in the UK. Flat terrain and quick outdoor escape suitable for all ages.
